719969f-a.folder: Fulton Street & Washington Street, Manhattan, NY
719969f-a.text:
Fulton Street, north side, west from and including Washington, to and including West Streets. The view shows the south side of
Washington Market.
May 4. 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

719970f-a.folder: Fulton Street & Washington Street, Manhattan, NY
719970f-a.text:
(1)
Fulton Street, south side, west from and including Washington, to and including West Streets. A portion of Washington Market
is shown on the right.
June 5, 1932
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a slightly different angle,
August 1, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same as No. 1, and showing a closer view of the S.W. corner
of Washington Street.
August 1, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

724099f-a.folder: Washington Street & Fulton Street, Manhattan, NY
724099f-a.text:
(1)
Washington Street, north from and including Fulton Street.
May 4, 1927
P.L. Sperr
NEG #5068

(2)
The same, showing a closer view of the S.W. corner of Fulton Street.  Also shown is Fulton Street, at, adjoining and west of the S.W. coner of Washington Street.
May 14, 1936.
P.L. Sperr

(3)
The same as No. 2, showing a more comprehensive view of "Clamy Dave's" oyster and clam market.  This site is part of the area of Washington Market.
April 17, 1937.
P.L. Sperr
